snippet.title: Burn, destroy, wreck, kill: Soccer's Pig War produces spies and battle cries in the Pacific Northwest
snippet.description:
Burn, destroy, wreck, kill: Soccer's Pig War produces spies and battle cries in the Pacific Northwest by Matt Negrin on Mar 26 2014, 10:56a
In 1859, an American farmer in the Northwest shot and killed a pig that was on his land. The pig belonged to an Irishman, who demanded $100 in repayment. Instead, the two men feuded for years, a...

snippet.title: Norm Benning selling Eldora truck on eBay
snippet.description:
Norm Benning selling Eldora truck on eBay by Jordan Bianchi on Aug 8 2013, 11:03p
The truck Norm Benning raced at Eldora in the Mudsummer Classic is up for bid on eBay and the veteran NASCAR driver explains to SB Nation why he’s selling his famous ride.

snippet.title: God bless All-Star Weekend, the ultimate NBA kaleidoscope
snippet.description:
God bless All-Star Weekend, the ultimate NBA kaleidoscope by Andrew Sharp on Feb 19 2013, 10:13a
The NBA All-Star experience is a world all its own, but then so is pro basketball. Take a look back at some winners and losers from the NBA's weekend in Houston.

snippet.title: NBA Lockout Winners And Losers (So Far): Michael Jordan Rides Again
snippet.description:
NBA Lockout Winners And Losers (So Far): Michael Jordan Rides Again by Jason Concepcion on Nov 18 2011, 10:38a
The NBA lockout still rages on, but we have a preliminary assessment of the winners and losers of the stoppage. As usual, Michael Jordan reigns.
